page.title: 06Media
page.content: { { { }In this part of the project we shall be talking about the news in Northampton on the radio and in the newspaper. Our local BBC radio station is in the centre of town and broadcasts on 1107 VHF and 96.6 STEREO. We also have a local independent radio station which is Hereward radio and broadcasts on medium wave and VHF. The two local newspapers within Northampton are Chronicle & Echo and the Post. These papers only contain local news and not news from out side Northampton. The Chronicle & Echo is a nightly paper that you have to pay for but the Post is free and comes weekly on a Thursday night.
